attributes.action: Make the Utility companies repair the roads at their own cost.  They trashed them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Utility companies have trashed our roads with uneven patches.  They should have to make them right and useable.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
